##

```{r map, echo=FALSE, fig.height=6}
library(leaflet)

bakeryLoc = data.frame(lat = 43.58184, lng = 1.44868)
bakeryIcon = makeIcon(
      iconUrl = "https://www.flaticon.com/svg/static/icons/svg/2490/2490661.svg",
      iconWidth = 31*215/230, iconHeight = 31,
      iconAnchorX = 31*215/230/2, iconAnchorY = 16
)

map = bakeryLoc %>%
      leaflet() %>%
      addTiles() %>%
      addMarkers(icon = bakeryIcon, popup = "Best Bakery in Town")

pubsLoc = data.frame(lat = c(43.59755, 43.59453), lng = c(1.44492, 1.44442))

addCircles(map = map, lat = c(43.59755, 43.59453), lng = c(1.44492, 1.44442), weight = 1, radius = 200, popup = "Pubs squares")
```
